text: Bruce Almighty is a 2003 American comedy movie starring Jim Carrey, Jennifer Aniston and Morgan Freeman. It follows a news journalist, who complains about his life to God, so Nolan himself is offered the chance to become God himself and see his responsibilities. It was released on May 23, 2003 to mixed reviews. A spin-off movie was released entitled Evan Almighty and a sequel is in the works. Category:2003 movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Buena Vista International movies Category:Movies composed by John Debney
title: Bruce Almighty
